docs.snippet: Germany are the top contender to win the 2014 World Cup with success now based on speed and dethroned champions Spain's "tiki-taka" tactics now a relic in modern day football, former Croatia striker Goran Vlaovic told Reuters in an interview....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany are the top contender to win the 2014 World Cup with success now based on speed and dethroned champions Spain's "tiki-taka" tactics now a relic in modern day football, former Croatia striker Goran Vlaovic told Reuters in an interview.

headline.main: Germany Top Dogs After Spanish Fiasco, Says Vlaovic
